features.name: Admin Client Settings Page || Test Scenarios

elements.name: Change the Default draw mode and Default draw type on Ticket Map

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Administration menu
Click on Client Settings
Search for the Default Ticket Draw Mode
Change Ticket Draw Mode to the "Work Area"
Search for the Default Ticket Draw Type
Change Ticket Draw Type to the "Polygon"

elements.name: Enabling the Default My Ticket settings to true

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Administration menu
Click on Client Settings
Search for the Default My Ticket of Ticket Search feature "Default My Ticket"
Change the value to "true"

elements.name: Verify to check user can access System Sync menus

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Administration menu
Click on System Sync
Verify the user able access the System Sync menus

elements.name: Verify to check user can access System Sync Export and Import settings

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Administration menu
Click on System Sync
Verify the user able access the Export settings and Import Settings

elements.name: Validate user can download the settings in System Sync

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Administration menu
Click on System Sync
Export the System settings

elements.name: Verify user able to access Notifications and its features

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Administration menu
Verify whether the Notifications Menu available
Click on Notifications Menu
Check the features are available Add,Date range, Search etc

elements.name: Verify user able to add a New Notification

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Administration menu
Verify whether the Notifications Menu available
Click on Notifications Menu
Click on the Add button
Enter Name "Test Notification"
Enter Description "This is test notification"
Select the notification type
Priority Type
Enter the category "High Note"
Select Released on
Select Expire on
Click on Save button

elements.name: Validate user can reset password

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Goto Users and search for the user "srisri"
Open user details
Click on the Reset Password
Enter password in both reset password and verify password field
Click on Submit button
Acknowledgement message should be displayed such as Password changed Successfully

elements.name: Update User's Excavator details

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Goto Users and search for the user "srisri"
Check whether get displayed with a record
Open user details
Click on Excavator menu of the respective user
Click on Edit button to update excavator details
Update address as "Belmont Church"
Click on Excavator Save button
User should get displayed with confirm window
Click on Yes to update the details

elements.name: Validate whether user able to add excavator

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Excavator menu option
Click on Add Excavator button
Enter Phone number with "9493034647"
Select excavator type as Excavator
Enter Name with "SriSri"
Enter Address "Belmont University"
Enter City with "Nashville"
Select state as AL
Enter Zip code with "37129"
Enter Contact Phone number as "9493034647"
Contact as "Sherwin"
Contact email "srisri.tummu@progressivepartnering.com"
Click on copy contact information
Click on Save button

elements.name: Delete a excavator record from the excavator page

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
User gets the GCT Home Page
User Login to the application
Click on I agree terms and conditions
User click on Login button
Click on Excavator menu option
Search for a record with named "SriSri"
Click on Excavator Search button
Click on the first record to view complete details
Click on Delete button

elements.name: Validate the User is able to assign excavator in Administration- Assign Excavator

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch

User Login to the application

Click on Assign Excavator

Click on the search button to find it

features.name: Home Owner Ticket Feature || Test Scenarios

elements.name: Validate Home Owner Ticket page on Dash Board Page

steps.name: GCT application URL to launch
Validate whether user get displayed with Home Owner Ticket Option
Validate User redirected to Create Home Owner Ticket Page
Validate User get displayed with Welcome message and Next button on 1st page
User should be able to submit the fields and get redirected to 2nd page
User should be able to click on Next button on the 2nd page to redirect to 3rd page
User should be able to confirm the project location details on 4th page by click on Yes
User should be able to select county on 5th page and redirect to 6th page by click on Yes
User should be able to enter location and redirect to 6th page by click on Next button
User should be able to enter the closest intersecting street to the project location and redirect to 7th page by click on Next
User should be able to enter driving directions to the project location and redirect to 8th page by click on Next button
User should be able to confirm to provide the type of project details for utility company
User should be able to provide estimated days to complete and marking provided or not on 10th page
User should be able to confirm project start date and redirect to 11th page by click on Next button
User should be able to any additional info or none and redirect to next page by click on Next button
User should be able to confirm details regarding usage of explosives and redirect final page to preview details.
User should be able to preview all details and submit the ticket successfully
User should get populated with a text that Ticket is submitted successfully

elements.name: Validate UnAuth User able to draw polygon at work site using area tool with work area tool

Validate User redirected to Create Home Owner Ticket Page

User should be able to confirm the project location details on 4th page by click on Yes
User should be able to select county on 5th page and redirect to 6th page by click on Yes

Goto Work site location on Home Owner Ticket Map
Select the Work area tool on Home Owner Ticket Map
Draw a Polygon using work area on Home Owner Ticket Map
Scroll up and click on Next button
User should be able to enter the closest intersecting street to the project location and redirect to 7th page by click on Next
User should be able to enter driving directions to the project location and redirect to 8th page by click on Next button

User should be able to confirm project start date and redirect to 11th page by click on Next button
User should be able to any additional info or none and redirect to next page by click on Next button
User should be able to confirm details regarding usage of explosives and redirect final page to preview details.
User should be able to preview all details and submit the ticket successfully
User should get populated with a text that Ticket is submitted successfully

Save the condition
